Sentencas: The xNiAlZn catalysts with different Ni loading (x=5, 10 and 20 wt%) and nearly constant Al/Zn weight ratio (Al/Zn = 0.73) were prepared by the citrate method and characterized by different techniques - S-BET, TPR, XRD, XPS, and TEM.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: The influence of parameters, such as reaction temperature, oxygen-to-fuel molar ratio, and Ni loading on hydrogen production was investigated.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: The catalysts were active in the partial oxidation of ethanol at atmospheric pressure in the temperature range 600-750 degrees C.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: The conversion was always complete at temperatures above 600 degrees C, regardless of the changes in other reaction conditions.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: A syngas is produced which can be used in solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: Selectivity to hydrogen and CO increased with increasing temperature and decreased with increasing Ni loading.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: The highest selectivity (S) was obtained over 5NiAlZn.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: At 700 degrees C this sample showed S(H-2) of 90%, S(CO) of 92%, and only small amounts of byproducts such as CO2 and CH4 were detected.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: Morphological and structural modifications in the catalysts under reaction conditions, determined by the amount of nickel, were closely related to the activity of the samples.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: The effect of the parameters on side reactions and distribution of byproducts were also discussed.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: During 100 h time-on-stream, ethanol conversion and selectivity to H2 and CO over 5NiAlZn and 10NiAlZn remained unchanged demonstrating stable performance of the catalysts.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: Additionally, the stability of the Ni catalyst was studied by means of simulated start-stop operation cycles during the partial oxidation reaction to simulate thermal cycles during the solid oxide fuel cell lifetime.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: With increasing number of thermal cycles a slight decline in ethanol conversion was observed and the selectivity to hydrogen and CO decreased.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts

Sentencas: By using a molar ratio oxygen/ethanol of 0.75 a syngas with high selectivity to H-2 and CO was obtained.
Titulo: Hydrogen production by bioethanol partial oxidation over Ni based catalysts
